original_text: My net also will I spread upon him, and he shall be taken in my snare: and I will bring him to Babylon to the land of the Chaldeans; yet shall he not see it, though he shall die there.
korean_text: 내가 또 내 그물을 그의 위에 치고 내 올무에 걸리게 하여 그를 끌고 갈대아 땅 바벨론에 이르리니 그가 거기에서 죽으려니와 그 땅을 보지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: My net also will I spread upon him
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 그물을 또한 그 위에 펼치리라

sentences.original_text: and he shall be taken in my snare
and I will bring him to Babylon
to the land of the Chaldeans
yet shall he not see it
